features: 【 HIGH QUALITY, LOW STIMULUS 】Up to 50 % LARGER & THICKER & SOFTER than common compressed tissues ! 100% cotton that make sure it SOFT LIKE A CLOULD ! Hypoallergenic suitable for both adult and kids and even baby !
【 FREE BONUS: TWO CASES】Take them with you everywhere ! Waterproof storage cases designed for the outdoors , camping , hiking or out on the boat .

【 START TO DECOMPOSE IN 3 WEEKS】COMPAWIPES are degrade naturally. If you have a number 2 on board , you have 2 choices, a biodegradable natural fibre wipe or biodegradable leaf . Either will work , believe me COMPAWIPES are more comfortable and soothing .
【 A THOUGHTFUL GIFT 】It provides everyone a clean environment when you are traveling far from home or camping overnight . Great gift for survival enthusiasts , hunters , and campers !
【 EMERGENCY SAVER 】Keep some on your glove box or in a purse ! Light enough to avoid emergency spills ! Great idea for emergency packs or your dogs emergency bag !

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Outdoor Activity, Coin Tissue Should Having Outdoor activities are so attractive for us to relax after stressful work days. Compawaipes coin tissues are ready to accompany your travel. No more nervous if there is no tissue paper outside! Body cleaning, dirt wiping, or emergency using. Only a spoonful of water is needed! We wish our tissues provide to Those who are finding balance between natural good quality products and a convenient way to have clean while to fulfill grab-and-go needs.
We understand your concerns, our tissues are made from,100% natural cotton, with no chemicals, additives nor scent. Great on all skin types, feels soft as cloud, pure as air. Keep clean on the go!

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice little product for its purpose!!
reviews.reviewText: I love the little tube the compressed toilet paper rolls come in. Perfect for travel size and for emergencies.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Far more versatile and useful that I could have imagined before using them!
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased these for use in remote areas without readily available facilities. However, these little wonders have proven to be versatile beyond what I initially purchased them for. If you're considering them for travel or dealing with messy situations, here's why I find them to be an convenient:Convenience and Versatility:Initially purchased for use in remote locations, they have proven their worth in more ways than one. From camping trips to dealing with messy situations while traveling with children, these compact and lightweight tablets have become an essential part of my travel kit.Size and Durability:The size of the wipes is decent and surprisingly sturdy for their compact form. They expand into a practical and reliable option for personal hygiene or cleaning up messes, especially when dealing with kids or in situations where standard facilities aren’t readily available.Potential for Reusability:Though I haven't personally tried reusing them, the sturdiness of the wipes does make me think they might be viable for a second use after rinsing and drying. This potential for reusability might further enhance their value, especially for longer trips or reducing waste.Portability and Ease of Use:Their compressed size makes them incredibly portable, fitting effortlessly into any travel bag or even a pocket. They're easy to use – just add water, and they expand into functional wipes for various purposes, offering a convenient solution for unexpected situations.Value and Conclusion:For anyone seeking a versatile, portable, and sturdy solution for travel or situations where conventional facilities are scarce, these Toilet Paper Tablets are a game-changer. They offer convenience, sturdiness, and a potential for reuse, making them a valuable addition to any travel or emergency kit.In summary, these dehydrated wipes are an excellent investment for those who frequently travel or find themselves in situations where cleanliness and hygiene are a priority. Whether it's for camping, dealing with kids, or unexpected messes, these wipes offer a reliable solution in a compact and convenient form.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best for an “oops” on the go.
reviews.reviewText: If you’re hiking, biking, walking, trying to get back to your hotel room with a clenched O-ring, this product is there for you. Now, I’m not suggesting any public indecency here, but if there isn’t any toilet paper around these things will save your butt (ha ha). Also, they work great for washing hands, cleaning up messes or blowing your nose when no napkins are close by.They are easy to put into a pocket, expand quickly and are large enough to be useful. I carry mine with everywhere as part of an emergency kit.You can’t go wrong with these things.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 1, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Why you should and why you shouldn't!
reviews.reviewText: Extremely compressed...I mean impressed!! 🤣👍These things are absolutely amazing! I don't know how they get towels into such tiny little tablets. My wife and I bought these for our bug out bags and they are just phenomenal. You can use them as paper towels, tissues, TP or whatever else you're big heart desires!Why you should:These towels are strong, compact and you are getting a ton of them for your money. They come with four plastic cases so that means you can keep one container in the car, one container in your bag, so on and so forth. Extremely convenient, well-made oh oh, and guess what else?? They are reusable! You can use a towel, wash it and then reuse it again! Doesn't get much better than this. I could imagine these would be great for camping, road trips and especially if you have children. The item arrived on time and intact.Why you shouldn't:There are cheaper brands out there that you might want to explore before you purchase this one. I can't tell you though that I am very happy with this brand and if I purchase in the future I will definitely be purchasing from this particular seller and brand name.I highly recommend these towels and hope that you use them in good health!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Weird how this works but it does. Just a lil bot of water and these tablets expand, making it into a usable napkin. Great for on the go type of things.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 16, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simply the best
reviews.reviewText: I carry these everywhere. My bag, my car, my work locker, my knitting bag..... And I use them all the time. It's always fun to see people freak out a little when I hand them one. Walking on a trail and walking buddy complains of itchy, dirty legs?? Bam!! Friend's toddler needs a wipe-down and the diaper bag is in the car?? Bam!! Kids have sticky fingers after a treat at the street market?? Bam!! Walked through a spiderweb?? Bam!! I drink a ton of water, so I always have a water bottle with me. I even use these at the gym to wipe down my equipment. It doesn't disintegrate and leave little paper pills all over the handles. I just spray the tablet with the sanitiser spray and it expands into a cleaning wipe. I can use the same one for my whole workout instead of half a dozen paper towels; just spritz between machines. I used to carry a travel pack of baby wipes, and they'd dry out or leak in my bag because the container is faulty. I couldn't use them because I have allergies to weird things. But these are so versatile!! Soft and strong. I've even spritzed them with hand sanitiser to clean hands. I use a liquid sanitiser, so it soaks it right up.

reviews.reviewTitle: This is gold for compact loadouts
reviews.reviewText: This is gold, might be a bit expensive but keeps your space low. Reccomended.
Just what I needed these are excellent
These work well, just add a drop of water and in a few seconds you have a hand towel.
